docs.title: the-very-simple-list-of-agentforce-best-practices
docs.text:
A living, intentionally simple list. The goal: keep Agentforce projects focused on business value, not over-engineering.

This repo collects simple, practical do’s and don’ts for working with Agentforce. The list itself lives here 👉 BEST-PRACTICES.md

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: Got a simple, practical best practice to add? Open a Pull Request — all contributions are welcome, but the list will stay intentionally short and clear.

docs.title: License
docs.text: This project is licensed under CC BY 4.0. You’re free to reuse it, as long as you give credit to: Luke Bottomley — the-very-simple-list-of-agentforce-best-practices
